## CYCLE\_HANDLING enum

Cycle handling strategy

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum CYCLE_HANDLING 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  BREAK | <code>0</code> | Stop rendering contexts at detected cycles |
|  RESOLVE | <code>1</code> | Resolve cycles by building cyclic in-memory structures |
